name: Trisha Whitehead
text: Best pizza our office has ever had! Called the manager to congratulate his team on several satisfied customers! Will be coming back for more! This is our office party go to! Thanks Hudson Team!

name: Jim Arnold
text: Great exp, ordered from the lot and they brought it out. Took < 15 from the time I placed it at lunchtime. Pizza was delicious made just as ordered.

name: Paul Lundgren
text: Service was very fast, food was hot. Love the text alerting.

name: Sweetness P
text: If you want burnt pizza this is the place to go. First time it happened the kid said they had the temperature too high. Tried again and the same thing. Burnt pizza and Cheese sticks. Wonâ€™t be fooled the third time.

name: Shopdesineed
text: The MANAGER is disgusting at this location. I waited 40 minutes in the store after I received an email my pizza was already ready. I asked the manager why it was taking so long and he screamed saying "YOU THINK your the only person who ordered a pizza today" I have emailed corporate and issued a complaint.

name: Kellie Butwina
text: Its been many years since we've eaten at Pizza hut.  Since we moved into the area we thought we would give it a try. We ordered Pizza and Boneless wings.  The Pizza didn't appear burnt but it tasted that way. The Wings were decent. The â€¦More

name: Kimberly Nader
text: Amazing service, fantastic food.

name: Jeff Goodman
text:
Awful ....ordered online for delivery
Order was wrong ...forgot the drinks
When I called NO ONE answers the phone â€¦More

name: Patricia Riegerix
text: This was the worst pizza I have ever had.  The crust was cooked to a crisp, the toppings were completely dried out.  They look like they had been dehydrated.  Wonâ€™t do that again.

name: Kylie
text: Ordered a pizza and wings Saturday night. Everything was yummy and it came super fast. Delivery person was very nice too. Thanks!!

name: Mialaxx
text: Great pizza and reasonable delivery time! Got here quicker than another pizza place even though I ordered an hour after I ordered from the other place!

name: Dawn
text: So.... Can I like say best pizza ever. I ordered pizza and bread sticks 2 weeks ago right before closing. I was utterly stunned when I bit into the best pizza hut pizza of all time. Pizza was not over cooked it was just perfect. I don't know what pizza hut is up too, but keep it up guys! Loved it.

name: Elizabeth Lear
text: Arrived to pick up an order to go and sneezed in the parking lot, a passing delivery man said, "Bless you!". I was greeted with a friendly smile by the gentleman at the front desk who helped me double check my order since I was picking up â€¦More

name: hunter amos
text: I ordered a small pizza and each slice was literally different size and my pizza was cold???? If I wanted this I wouldâ€™ve went to chuck e cheese.

name: Brian Schwartz
text: We order pizza for lunch every so often at work. Every time it's been great. No complaints with the food or service.

name: Rich Prulhiere
text: Love it! Favorite place for pizza in Hudson!!

name: Trevor Philips
text: This pizza hut is the best one in the area. David, Bryan, and Tyler are the best! I sometimes go to the Twinsburg and Macedonia pizza huts, but recently, I have been driving to the Hudson one exclusively solely because of the the friendly â€¦More

name: Lisa OMalley
text: Havenâ€™t ordered from here in awhile, and now I remember why. Inconsistent quality. Gave me a thin crust I didnâ€™t ask for, way too much garlic butter, and asked for light sauce... nope. Each of us had 1 piece and threw the rest away.

name: Taylor W
text: If it wasn't for the friendly staff, I would be giving this a 1 star. The past 3 or 4 times I've ordered here the pizza crust was disappointingly soggy, badly needed crisped up. Even worse we got almost no sauce on the pizza. At least I can â€¦More

name: Sebastian Marshall
text: Excellent staff!

name: Donyetta Osborn
text: I didn't even want to give one star. I placed an online order and after it was submitted, the time for arrival was 125 minutes. After waiting 2 1/2 hours, I finally decided to cancel my order. Of course, the pizza was already on its way. This was a terrible experience.

name: Mr Lately
text: Great food and service. The staff great especially the delivery ðŸ˜Ž

name: Dave Miller
text: Ordered pizza last night (11/28) and it tasted different than usual. Tried to eat a piece, absolutely could not finish it. HORRIBLE. Then, put it in the fridge, thought maybe something was weird with me. NOPE. My entire fridge smells rotten now

name: Pat Scott
text: Great pizza, great service and great guys working there.

name: Gary Harrison
text: Excellent staff. Pizza was ready ahead of schedule.

name: john radcliff
text: They are in Hudson but won't deliver to Hudson I have to call the Twinsburg branch very strange. The Twinsburg branch is literally twice as far away from me

name: Kat W
text:
Seriously? a $2.79 delivery fee?? That is positively absurd!!!

Ordered this time only because no choice but will NEVER order delivery from there again.

name: Thompson Corpus
text: Man, this guy Cap too much.

name: Trent Henderson
text: Literally had one of the worst delivery experiences I've ever had

name: Posh Cruz
text: Rude disrespectful and boycotted.  Well we will never return.

name: Jason Brumbach
text: Fast service.
